trans-unit.source: Represents a legend cell in a legend item.
A legend is populated with legend items, which are represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection>.
These legend items consist of individual legend cells, which are in turn represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the class with a text parameter that specifies the cell text or image name.
A `string` value that represent the cell text or image name, depending on the type of cell.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified cell type and a text parameter that specifies the cell text or image name.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType"></xref> value that represents the legend cell type to be used.
A string value that represents the cell text or image name, depending on the type of cell.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified cell type, content alignment, and a text parameter that specifies the cell text or image name.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType"></xref> value that represents the legend cell type to be used.
A `string` value representing the cell text or image name, depending on the type of cell.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the legend cell contents.
Gets or sets the alignment of the legend cell contents.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Alignment%2A> property is used to align text, series symbols or images within the legend cell.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the legend cell contents.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter"></xref>.
Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.BackColor%2A> property has the highest priority when setting the background color of any entity in the legend.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the legend cell's background.
Gets or sets the number of horizontal cells used to draw the contents of the legend cell.

If the cell contents must extend beyond the cell width, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellSpan%2A> property to the number of cells required to fit the contents.
This property is most often used if you wish to add an extended header or title to the legend.
When this property is set to a value larger than 1, empty legend cells must be added in order to accommodate the contents of the extended legend cell.
An `integer` value that represents the number of horizontal cells used to draw the legend cell contents.
The default value is 1.
Gets or sets the legend cell type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell.
One of the following cell types must be specified:
Text: A string is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Text%2A> property, and will be displayed in the legend cell.

SeriesSymbol: A series symbol is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class.
It will be displayed for the legend cell.
Recall that a series symbol is a visual indicator—a line, rectangle or marker.

When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Marker>, all marker attributes of the custom item apply to the cell.
Image: An image is defined using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Image%2A> property and will be displayed in the legend cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the type that is used to define the contents of the legend cell.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Text"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
`true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets the font for the legend cell.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Font%2A> property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell.
If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur.
To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object that represents the font for the legend cell.
The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt".
Gets or sets the text color of the legend cell.

This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Text>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the legend cell text.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the image in a legend cell.
The image name should be a URL.

This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
A `string` value that represents the name of the image to be used in the legend cell.
Gets or sets the size of the image in a legend cell.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.ImageSize%2A> property is used to explicitly set the width and height of the legend cell image.

This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> value that represents the size of the image.
The default value is (0,0), which means the original size of the image will be used.
Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the image is drawn.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.ImageTransparentColor%2A> property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is used as a transparent color in a legend cell image.
Gets the legend in which this cell belongs.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object that represents the legend in which this cell belongs.
Gets the legend item in which this cell belongs.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> object that represents the legend item in which this cell belongs.
Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell.
Margins are measured as a percentage of the font size for the legend cell.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object that represents the top, bottom, left, and right values of the legend cell margins.
The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".
Gets or sets the name of the legend cell.
The name of the legend cell must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Name%2A> property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> object from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
If you set this property to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.
A `string` value that represents the text name of the legend cell.
Gets or sets the size of the series symbol that is displayed in the legend cell.
The size of the series symbol is measured as a percentage of the legend font size.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.SeriesSymbolSize%2A> property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that represents the size of the series symbol.
The default values for the width and height of the symbol are 200 and 70, respectively.
Gets or sets the legend cell text.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.Text%2A> property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.CellType%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Text>.
A `string` value that represents the text for the legend cell.
The default value is a zero-length string.
Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell.
If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence.
This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell.ToolTip%2A> property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
A `string` value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell.
The default value is a zero-length string.
